body:
Very often the documentation badge on `develop` says *failing*. The cause is the time it takes to build the docs, that may exceed the maximum allowed on readthedocs (15 min.) An example of a failing build is [here](https://readthedocs.org/projects/spack/builds/6518192/).

### Expected Result

A  documentation badge that says *passing* - in line with the "docs" unit test that passed on Travis

### Actual Result

Sometimes we have a *passing* result, sometimes a *failing*, depending whether or not readthedocs can build our documentation in less than 15 min.
title: The build time for docs needs to be reduced
